nodes.text: The Talcharaim system was located in the Interior Region, an area of the Hapes Cluster in the Slice portion of the Inner Rim. It was connected via hyperlane to the Sivoria system. The Talcharaim system shared its name with the song Talcharaim Mist-Night.
The Talcharaim system was introduced in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square O-9.
